messages.subject: crass T-shirts
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/9/03 12:29:29 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/9/03 12:29:29 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< It's a cool place to work. If you go to a concert and fill out a form
about
what people were wearing, they'll pay your expenses. >>

I'll have to tell Trevor about this...thanks. Pensacola isn't exactly a mecca
for great musicians to perform, but we do get some good ones every year.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] crass T-shirts

starsuncloud@... writes:

> Oooh, ooh, we saw that one!!! He must shop at Hot Topic too.

My son works there. He has a t-shirt that says "Dork" in every color they

It's a cool place to work. If you go to a concert and fill out a form about
what people were wearing, they'll pay your expenses.

Tuck

messages.messageBody:
This is going to date me, but I thought (reading the subject lines)
that this thread was about t-shirts for an old punk rock band
(Crass). I've still got a few of their shirts hanging out somewhere,
I'd bet ;-)

Blue Skies,
-Robin-

messages.subject: crass T-shirts
messages.msgSnippet: Hooo boy. Tia s grandson and Kelly s son s T-shirts are making me think Trevors are extremely mild.....phew. He bought one that Shyrley should have You laugh
messages.messageBody:
Hooo boy. Tia's grandson and Kelly's son's T-shirts are making me think
Trevors are extremely mild.....phew.
He bought one that Shyrley should have "You laugh because I'm different, I
laugh because you're all the same"
And especially wanted the one that said "It's not raining,my Ninja monkey is
flinging poo on you"
Nothing I would be embarassed to have him wear in public at least....for now.
:)

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
